summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Sixteenth Avenue Northeast, University Boulevard, Eighteenth Avenue Northeast and Nineteenth Avenue Northeast, each from East Forty-fifth Street to East Fifty-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by attaching hydrants to the existing water mains therein, in accordance with Resolution No. 1492 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment, as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
